title: Diff between pres and parl system

content.question: One difference between the British parliamentary system and the Nigerian presidential system is that the Nigerian presidential system

choices.label: ensures there will be no periods of divided government
sets no fixed term of office for the executive
makes the executive subject to a possible vote of no confidence by the legislature
has an executive electorally independent from the legislature

content.answer: has an executive electorally independent from the legislature

topic.text: 2.2: Comparing Parliamentary, Presidential, and Semi-Presidential Systems
